name: KICK (taxol)
description:
You are a small official in the Ming Dynasty, the court will give you a certain amount of grain every year, your task is to pay enough grain every year at the time of harvest.

Operation Process:

  1. click “CLICK” to levy
  2. appropriate people's grain selectively by holding “KICK”
  3. click “COMPENSATE” to make up the lack of food
  4. click “SUBMIT” to move into the next year
